m:MaterialTitle.title: Raised
m:MaterialTitle.description: The raised button is a standard button that signify actions and seek to give depth to a mostly flat page.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="DEFAULT" backgroundColor="WHITE" textColor="BLACK"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Primary" waves="LIGHT" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Disabled" waves="LIGHT" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Warn" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="RED" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Icon Color" waves="RED" backgroundColor="WHITE" textColor="BLACK" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" iconColor="RED"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Outlined
m:MaterialTitle.description: Outlined buttons are medium-emphasis buttons. They contain actions that are important, but arenâ€™t the primary action in an app.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" type="OUTLINED" waves="DEFAULT" backgroundColor="WHITE" textColor="BLACK"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Primary" type="OUTLINED" waves="LIGHT" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Disabled" type="OUTLINED" waves="LIGHT" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Warn" type="OUTLINED" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="RED" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Icon Color" type="OUTLINED" waves="RED" backgroundColor="WHITE" textColor="BLACK" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" iconColor="RED"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Floating
m:MaterialTitle.description: The floating circular action button is meant for very important functions.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="RED" iconType="CAKE" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" iconType="ANDROID" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" iconType="MESSAGE" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" iconType="GROUP" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="RED" iconType="CAKE" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="DEFAULT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="WHITE" iconColor="GREEN" iconType="ANDROID" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: FLAT
m:MaterialTitle.description: Flat buttons are usually used within elements that already have depth like cards or dialog.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" textColor="BLACK" type="FLAT" waves="DEFAULT" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Primary (No Waves)" textColor="BLUE" type="FLAT" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Disabled" type="FLAT" waves="DEFAULT" enabled="false" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Warn" textColor="RED" type="FLAT" waves="RED" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Large
m:MaterialTitle.description: This button has a larger height for buttons that need more attention.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" size="LARGE"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" size="LARGE"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Icon Button
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using MaterialIcon component extends ButtonBased which has predefined click events and functionalities

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="MENU" iconColor="BLUE" waves="DEFAULT" circle="true"/>
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="FAVORITE" iconColor="RED" waves="DEFAULT" enabled="false" circle="true"/>
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="MORE_VERT" iconColor="GREY" waves="DEFAULT" circle="true"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled
m:MaterialTitle.description: When you set enabled='false' All events will be disabled.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" size="LARGE" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" type="FLAT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" iconType="POLYMER" enabled="false"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Events
m:MaterialTitle.description: MaterialButtons , MaterialIcons and MaterialLinks extends ButtonBase which implements all Mouse Handlers, Click Handlers and other events.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnClick" text="Click Me" waves="LIGHT" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnHover" text="Hover Me" waves="LIGHT" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnDoubleClick" text="Double Click Me" waves="LIGHT" textColor="WHITE" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Links
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using Material Link you can easily add href functionality into your app for navigation

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialLink href="#normal" text="Normal Link" textColor="RED" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialLink href="#material" text="Link with Href" textColor="RED" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialLink href="#design" text="Link with Different Icon color" textColor="BLACK" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" iconColor="RED"/>
<m:MaterialLink href="#design" text="Disabled Link" textColor="BLACK" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" iconColor="RED" enabled="false"/>
